herodata.name: Raihan Hosen.
herodata.subtitle: web-developer
herodata.pera: I'm a Tunisian based web designer & front‑end developer focused on crafting clean & user‑friendly experiences, I am passionate about building excellent software that improves the lives of those around me.

aboutdata.description: Developing software for the world of intent is something I'm passionate about and I'm dedicated to making the world of intent easy and affordable for everyone. aboutdata.quote: I am a Web developer who cares about the code and the people.

projects.description: My projects makes use of vast variety of latest technology tools. My best experience is to create Data Science projects and deploy them to web applications using cloud infrastructure.

partners.title: We Work With the Best Partners
partners.desc: While we are at the forefront of and specialize in design-build, we are very familiar with a number of delivery methods and are confident we can find the process that will best help you meet your goals.
